```{r library, include = FALSE, warning = FALSE, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
library(readxl)
library(knitr)
```

```{r}
acs_vars <- load_variables(2019, "acs5")
```

```{r}
white <- get_acs(geography = "tract",
                          state = "Massachusetts",
                          year = 2019,
                          output = "wide",
                          variables = c(tot_pop = 'B01003_001',
                                        w_pop = 'B02001_002'),
                          geometry = TRUE)

white <- white %>%
  mutate(pct_white = round(100 * w_popE / tot_popE)) %>%
  filter(tot_popE > 0)
```
